subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:
Notification!
This is to notify you that, we have retrieved the total sum of
$950,000.00 from the different transaction you were involved in West
Africa and the money is ready to refund back to you.
Best Regards.
Dr. Akinwumi Adesina
President /Retrieving General afdb

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Dear Dr. Akinwumi Adesina,

Thank you for your email. I am surprised to hear about this sum of money as I don't recall being involved in any transactions in West Africa. Could you please provide more details about the nature of these transactions and how my name came to be associated with them?

Best wishes,
Joyce

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Alright, thanks for your feedback,


So which method would you prefer to receive your funds with?


Please the options are below please get back to me with your choice.


(1)An International ATM Card?

(2)International Bank Draft?

(3)Bank To Bank Transfer?

(4)Conner it in Cash and Deliver It To You With Consignment Box?


And secondly please Provide The Information Below.


Full name

Country

Age

Gender

Home Address

Occupation

Direct Phone Number


Your Urgent Respond Is Needed Asap As We Don’t Have Enough Time To Waist On This Transaction Anymore.
Best Regards

Dr. Akinwumi Adesanya.

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Alright, your funds have been converted into an bank  draft ,so the only thing delaying right now is that you your bank draft required a proper activation,

I have already deposited and covert your funds into an Bank draft

So the only thing delaying right now is that  your Bank draft must be well activated to enable the Bank draft to be acceptable in every part of the world.

And the activation fee is 800 dollars, after I
Explained the situation to Sir Charles Feeney,he transferred the last 500 dollars that he has access to on your behalf. So the fee is remaining 300 dollars,if you can be able to send the 300 dollars,I will get yourBank  Drat activated and you will receive it in the next 24 hours after you send the money because our delivery only take 24 hours to get to the beneficiary destination.

That's the current situation now.so everything depends on you now.

body:
